historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-114, see notes following § 42-3171.01.

DC CODE § 42-3173.09

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Within 30 days after the date of the mailing of the notice of final determination under § 42-3173.07, an interested party may file a petition for review in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia challenging the final determination.

If a petition has been filed under subsection (a) of this section and the Mayor has been served with the petition, the Mayor shall not demolish or enclose the deteriorated structure under the authority of this subchapter until the court issues an order authorizing the Mayor to act, enters final judgment against the petitioner, or dismisses the petition.

chapter.text: Quick Acquisition of Abandoned and Nuisance Property.
